Posts.Content: Sep 13, 2018 02:18PM smansmom wrote: @mrsayala24 I did egg harvesting in 12 days, and had the surgery two days before my double mastectomy. I am also triple negative and 28 years old. I was diagnosed in June just 5 weeks after having my first baby. In 12 days they got 11 eggs and 3 embryos made it through the freezing process. I’m now on my 4th round of chemo. Stay strong and positive, please message me if you have questions or want to talk. Sending love and prays you’re way.
Posts.Title: Getting ready to start chemo and no time for egg preservation! Mrsayala24 smansmom
